```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Use dplyr mutate in a pipe to change classes of variables !!! 

```{r}

  mutate(
    year = make_date(year)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    percent = as.integer(perc)
  )

```
